name: Portfolio Website
description: A sleek and responsive personal portfolio showcasing projects, technical skills, and development experience. Built with Vue.js and TailwindCSS, optimized for performance and accessibility.
role: Front-end Developer – Designed and developed the portfolio UI using Vue.js and TailwindCSS, ensuring fast load times and a smooth user experience across devices.

name: Blog App
description: A modular blog platform featuring CRUD article management, nested commenting, RESTful APIs, and a clean user interface. Built using Laravel for the backend and Vue.js for the frontend.
role: Full-stack Developer – Built the back-end logic and API with Laravel, integrated Vue.js for the UI, and structured the project with a scalable modular architecture.

name: Electricien – WordPress Website
description: A professional WordPress website for electricien, featuring responsive design, custom theme development, plugin integration, and optimized for SEO and performance.
role: Full-stack Developer – Developed a custom WordPress theme, integrated essential plugins, ensured responsive design, and optimized the site for SEO and performance.

name: Sanction Management Module – SOLI-LMS
description: A fully integrated module within SOLI-LMS for automating the management of learner sanctions related to absenteeism. Features include customizable rule-based sanction calculations, daily automatic checks, manual triggers, visual dashboards, and a detailed sanction history log.
role: Full-stack Developer – Led the development of the Sanction Management module, including logic implementation in Laravel, dynamic dashboard integration using Vue.js, and MySQL database design for tracking rule-based sanctions.

name: AI-Powered Phone Lead Qualification System
description: An AI-driven telephony system that qualifies leads via phone by combining SIP integration, voice interaction (STT, NLP, TTS), and real-time API communication between Asterisk, Python microservices, and Laravel.
role: Full-stack Developer – Developing Python microservices for speech processing, integrating FastAPI endpoints with Laravel, and building a Vue.js dashboard to monitor and manage call activity and lead qualification results.

name: IoT Real-Time Sensor Dashboard
description: A complete real-time IoT monitoring system using the MERN-like stack (MongoDB, Express, Node) combined with Vue.js. It features live sensor data streaming via Socket.io, historical data visualization with charts, and a responsive dashboard.
role: Full-stack Developer – Designed and implemented a robust real-time architecture, including a REST API, Socket.io server for live data push, Mongoose data models, and a reactive Vue 3 dashboard for visualization and alerting.
